metadata.title: CVE-2023-52783 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: wangxun: fix kernel panic due to null pointerWhen the device uses a custom subsystem vendor ID, the functionwx_sw_init() returns before the memory of 'wx->mac_table' is allocated.The null pointer will causes the kernel panic.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
